About.Hours & facilities: Archives room open Wednesday during school term between 8.30am and 4.30pm. Appointment necessary. General reference assistance and copying services available.

About.Acquisition focus: The history of Strathcona Girls Grammar School as an independent non-denominational school (1924-1942) and as a Baptist Girls Grammar School (since 1943).

About.Major holdings: The school archives are mainly in-house but will accept significant documents, photographs and memorabilia from past students and staff.
